articles.title: COVID-19 can damage lungs so badly that 'only hope' is transplant - Medical Xpress

articles.title: After 256 days working nonstop, doctor pleads with public to help halt Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: The Texas doctor captured in a photo cradling a distraught Covid-19 patient on Thanksgiving has spoken of the sad isolation of his elderly patients and pleaded with people to "do the basic things" to avoid infection and stay out of hospital.
articles.content:
Today is Dr. Joseph Varon's 251st straight day of working at United Memorial Medical Center in Houston.
